subject: Career
title: The Side Project Runway
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Side Project Runway.

hook.text: She didn't quit her accounting job to become a UX designer. She built a portfolio on nights and weekends.

buildup.text: The side project runway: build credibility in your new field while your current job pays the bills.

discovery.text: Freelance projects, volunteer work, and personal projects create a track record without financial risk.

twist.text: It takes longer â€” usually 6-18 months. But the transition is smoother and less financially terrifying.

climax.text: The goal: by the time you make the jump, you already have proof you can do the new work.

punchline.text: Build the bridge before you burn the old one.

quiz.question: What is the side project runway strategy?
options: Building credibility in a new field while your current job pays the bills
Only applying to jobs in the new field
